front.title: The Exponential Security System TESS: An Identity-Based Cryptographic Protocol for Authenticated Key-Exchange (E.I.S.S.-Report 1995/4)

author.organization: University of Karlsruhe, European Institute for System Security (E.I.S.S.), Institut fuer Algorithmen und Kognitive Systeme (IAKS)

abstract.t: This informational RFC describes the basic mechanisms and functions of an identity based system for the secure authenticated exchange of cryptographic keys, the generation of signatures, and the authentic distribution of public keys.
